overview: The film follows a group of kids who seek acceptance and validation as they desperately try to navigate the world of social media. They are not cool and they can’t attract followers, and because of this they are marginalized and bullied. Seeking to escape this reality they use a technique of lucid dreaming to open the door of Dreamworld! It’s a world hidden in a special corner of dreams, inhabited by fantastic, magical, and strange creatures. A place where they can become heroes, celebrated, liked and accepted! But not everything is as it seems, as their escape from reality has a price.
title: Dream­world
